trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref uid="langword_csharp_totalDigits" name="totalDigits" href=""></xref> facet from XML Schema as specified by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C).
trans-unit.target: 代表<xref uid="langword_csharp_totalDigits" name="totalDigits" href=""> </xref> World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 所指定從 XML 結構描述 facet。

trans-unit.source: This class can be used to specify a restriction on the number of digits that can be entered for the value of a <xref uid="langword_csharp_simpleType" name="simpleType" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別可以用來指定限制可輸入值的數字的數目<xref uid="langword_csharp_simpleType" name="simpleType" href=""></xref>項目。

trans-unit.source: That value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_totalDigits" name="totalDigits" href=""></xref> must be a positive integer.
trans-unit.target: 該值的<xref uid="langword_csharp_totalDigits" name="totalDigits" href=""></xref>必須是正整數。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaTotalDigitsFacet"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaTotalDigitsFacet"></xref>類別。
